name: Turkey Jump
description:
The age old question: Can turkey's actually fly?
Well I guess that depends on your definition of flying.
Does falling with style count? If so then here is the game to play!

Keep the turkey soaring and off the dinner plate as you see just how far you can make it!

Use AD or the Arrow Left & Right Keys to move your turkey from either side of the screen.

Collect corn for a boost into the air, a full ear of corn sends you higher then just a kernel.

Avoid the dinner plate or it's game over!

This project is the result of completing an assignment for Game Development I at the University of Central Missouri. Finished Oct. 15th, 2021
